com.mygdx.game

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Agent>

    public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Agent>
    Represents a party member or an enemy in battle.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Agent.AgentType
      Represents the type of agent (either friendly or enemy).

      • Agent

        public Agent(java.lang.String name,
             Agent.AgentType type,
             Statistics stats,
             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> skills,
             CurrentEquipment equipment,
             int texture)
        Creates a new Agent with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this Agent
        type - the type of this Agent (friendly/enemy)
        stats - the statistics of this Agent
        skills - the list of skills that this Agent can use
        equipment - the current equipment this Agent has equipped
        texture - the index of the texture to use for this Agent

    • Method Detail

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Agent agent)
        Compares this Agent to another based on speed. Used to determine turn order.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Agent>
        Parameters:
        agent - the Agent to compare to
        Returns:
        the result of the comparison

      • dealDamage

        public int dealDamage(int power,
                      Agent attacker)
        Damages this Agent. Takes defence and attacker strength into account. Also has a change to evade the attack based on dexterity.
        Parameters:
        power - the power of the attack
        attacker - the attacker
        Returns:
        the actual damage taken
